players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "I am the detective and I investigated Diana last night. She is the mafioso. We must vote her out today!"
Diana: "Charlie, you're just trying to frame me because you're the real mafioso. I investigated you last night and you're suspicious!"
You: "Wait, Diana just claimed she investigated Charlie, but Charlie claimed to be the detective. Only detectives can investigate, so one of you is definitely lying."

You: "Diana, you just contradicted yourself. You said you investigated Charlie, but only detectives can investigate. If Charlie is the detective like he claims, then you can't also be one. This proves you're lying and likely the mafioso."
Diana: "Bob, I misspoke earlier. I meant I suspect Charlie based on his quick accusation, not that I investigated him. He's probably the mafioso trying to mislead us. Let's vote for him."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
